name: Temperate
description: A planet with moderate temperatures, suitable for human life and a wide range of ecosystems.

name: Cold
description: A planet with low temperatures, often covered in ice and snow, with limited habitability.

name: Hot
description: A planet with high temperatures, often due to proximity to its star or a runaway greenhouse effect, making it nearly inhospitable.

name: Frozen
description: A planet with extremely low temperatures, often with a frozen surface and a thin or nonexistent atmosphere, making it largely uninhabitable.

name: Scorching
description: A planet with surface temperatures so high that they can melt rock and metal, often due to extreme proximity to its star or intense greenhouse effects, rendering it completely uninhabitable.
